formatted_address: 5 Changi Business Park Central 1, #01-K7 Changi City Point, Singapore 486038
name: Toast Box (Changi City Point)

reviews.text:
Queue is not moving again,  very unmotivated staffing. Need to improve overdue.

The speed is slow, it takes a long time to serve food even there are not many customers.

uncomfortable chairs and small tables.
The Kaya butter toast here is good, with thick Kaya.  Nice teabreak on a weekend afternoon.

Came in the night for dinner, glad to know they close at 9pm. Nice, cosy location to chill over a cup of hot coffee. The staff are friendly, polite and efficient. The place is also rather clean and tidy. Coffee was brewed well and hot, which is to my liking. Will be back when am out and about the business park. Love the designs of their takeaway cups too.
No service at all and ignore your coffee order. They make it the way they like it base on their preference. Recommend toast box to review their employees to maintain its reputation.

The service is good, the manager is very professional and helpful, he trained his staff and team very well at handling their respective roles. Food is good, treatment of customers is even better. They are very polite. Coffee is brewed well too.

vicinity: 5 Changi Business Park Central 1, #01-K7 Changi City Point
